tweetSentenceList.constTree: (ROOT (S (NP (NNP Thanksgiving) (NN day) (CD I)) (VP (MD will) (VP (VB have) (NP (NP (DT a) (JJ great)) (PP (IN for) (NP (NN everyone))) (SBAR (WHNP (WP who)) (S (VP (VBZ follows) (S (NP (PRP me)) (ADVP (RB here)) (VP (VBG #shocking)))))))))))
